alert.note: Alert for Pulaski (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 12 at 4:37PM EDT until October 12 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WAYNE AND SOUTHWESTERN PULASKI COUNTIES... At 437 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mill Springs, or 7 miles north of Monticello, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Frazer around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Bronston, Burnside and Somerset. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
